Text: People who otherwise don't read comics download this and seed it perpetually? Thanks for uploading.
Well, maybe, because it's very popular, thanks to it's TV series.
Because like the show, as soon as your're done with the issue you can't wait for the next. I know It's one of the first I d/l and read when it comes out
The cult following of this series is an unexplainable phenomenon, to be sure.
yeah its the show i have been reading this comic since 2005 and it was not nearly as popular as it is today but its also just a good read

Well, it looks like Kirkman is wrapping this whole thing up.

Thanks for the upload
I find it completely ridiculous that issue #1 recently went for $10,000 on ebay. Especially since it was a non-limited release publication.
Thank you so much for this!
